verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* to the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, Go your \w ways|strong="G5217"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* pour \w out|strong="G1632"\w* the \w vials|strong="G5357"\w* of the \w wrath|strong="G2372"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w went|strong="G0565"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* poured \w out|strong="G1632"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w vial|strong="G5357"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w fell|strong="G1096"\w* a \w noisome|strong="G2556"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w grievous|strong="G4190"\w* \w sore|strong="G1668"\w* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* the \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w mark|strong="G5480"\w* of the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add upon\add* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w image|strong="G1504"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* poured \w out|strong="G1632"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w vial|strong="G5357"\w* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of a \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \add man\add*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* poured \w out|strong="G1632"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w vial|strong="G5357"\w* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* the \w rivers|strong="G4215"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fountains|strong="G4077"\w* of \w waters|strong="G5204"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of the \w waters|strong="G5204"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, Thou \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, which \w art|strong="G5607"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wast|strong="G2258"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shalt \w be|strong="G3741"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* thou hast \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* \w thus|strong="G5023"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* they have \w shed|strong="G1632"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* thou hast \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* to \w drink|strong="G4095"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w altar|strong="G2379"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, Even \w so|strong="G3483"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w Almighty|strong="G3841"\w*, \w true|strong="G0228"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w* \add are\add* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w judgments|strong="G2920"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w fourth|strong="G5067"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* poured \w out|strong="G1632"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w vial|strong="G5357"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G2739"\w* was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to \w scorch|strong="G2739"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* were \w scorched|strong="G2739"\w* with \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w heat|strong="G2738"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="G0987"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w plagues|strong="G4127"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w repented|strong="G3340"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w fifth|strong="G3991"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* poured \w out|strong="G1632"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w vial|strong="G5357"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w seat|strong="G2362"\w* of the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* full of \w darkness|strong="G4656"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w gnawed|strong="G3145"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w* \w for|strong="G1537"\w* \w pain|strong="G4192"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="G0987"\w* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w because|strong="G1537"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w pains|strong="G4192"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w sores|strong="G1668"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w repented|strong="G3340"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w deeds|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sixth|strong="G1623"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* poured \w out|strong="G1632"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w vial|strong="G5357"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w river|strong="G4215"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="G2166"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w* was dried \w up|strong="G3583"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* of the \w kings|strong="G0935"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w east|strong="G0395"\w* might be \w prepared|strong="G2090"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w* \w like|strong="G3664"\w* \w frogs|strong="G0944"\w* \add come\add* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* of the \w dragon|strong="G1404"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* of the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* of the false \w prophet|strong="G5578"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* they \w are|strong="G1526"\w* the \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w* of \w devils|strong="G1142"\w*, \w working|strong="G4160"\w* \w miracles|strong="G4592"\w*, \add which\add* go \w forth|strong="G1909"\w* \w unto|strong="G3588"\w* the \w kings|strong="G3588"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G3588"\w* of the \w whole|strong="G4863"\w* \w world|strong="G3650"\w*, to \w gather|strong="G0846"\w* \w them|strong="G1519"\w* \w to|strong="G4171"\w* the \w battle|strong="G2250"\w* of \w that|strong="G3173"\w* \w great|strong="G2316"\w* \w day|strong="G3588"\w* of \w God|strong="G3841"\w* \w Almighty|strong="G3841"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, I \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w thief|strong="G2812"\w*. \w Blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \add is\add* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w watcheth|strong="G1127"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w keepeth|strong="G5083"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w garments|strong="G2440"\w*, \w lest|strong="G2443"\w* he \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w naked|strong="G1131"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w see|strong="G0991"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w shame|strong="G0808"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w gathered|strong="G4863"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w together|strong="G4863"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* in the Hebrew \w tongue|strong="G1447"\w* \w Armageddon|strong="G0717"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w seventh|strong="G1442"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* poured \w out|strong="G1632"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w vial|strong="G5357"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w air|strong="G0109"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w came|strong="G1831"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w out|strong="G0575"\w* of the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* of \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, It is \w done|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w voices|strong="G5456"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thunders|strong="G1027"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lightnings|strong="G0796"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w earthquake|strong="G4578"\w*, such \w as|strong="G3634"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w since|strong="G0575"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, so \w mighty|strong="G5082"\w* an \w earthquake|strong="G4578"\w*, \add and\add* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* was \w divided|strong="G1096"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w parts|strong="G3313"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w cities|strong="G4172"\w* of the \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* \w fell|strong="G4098"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w Babylon|strong="G0897"\w* came in \w remembrance|strong="G3415"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, to \w give|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w* the \w cup|strong="G4221"\w* of the \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* of the \w fierceness|strong="G2372"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w island|strong="G3520"\w* fled \w away|strong="G5343"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w mountains|strong="G3735"\w* \w were|strong="G2147"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w fell|strong="G2597"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w hail|strong="G5464"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \add every stone\add* \w about|strong="G5613"\w* the weight of a \w talent|strong="G5006"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="G0987"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* because \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w plague|strong="G4127"\w* of the \w hail|strong="G5464"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the \w plague|strong="G4127"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G2076"\w* \w exceeding|strong="G4970"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w*.
